message.body: what the frick did you just say about the sun
what nooo the sun is so nice today :(
i assume you timed this stream perfectly so you would raid FM exactly when Wolfie starts Farewell
good fun and have luck on the avoidment tournadance
i cant give everyone luck its the same as wishing no one luck
this part looks scary as hell
yeah you know you make a good point
i should give my luck to someone else
you make a good argument max
Hi Max, gl  i suck in avoidances today so much
you are not making any sence
how many times have you heard the "it makes dollars joke"
ive heard it too many times
in all likelyhood max is gonna lose round 1 so he'll need my luck more than anyone
ah so you dont need my luck then
max is keeping the primes to himself
i mean he has memorized everything
imo the hardest save in the area
you're all cheaters you're gonna seed the whole tourney
easiest way to win the tourney:
im the biggest not cheater in this tournament as im not even participating
i deserve my luck the most
want good luck for the avoidance tournament? stare directly at the sun
@not_important__ im not participating, so give me your luck
googling "shirtless non muscular man" to recreate an image i saw in a dream
luck wont matter in the tourney bc i will own no matter what
my luck is a negative number
the most luck i need is actually catching the avoidance tourney
deep breaths are gonna win you the tourney
also about HK, yeah hopefully, i see that people are just going crazier about mods, so i'd assume the multiplayer one works even better now
the harder bummer screams the lower his hitcount is
i cant wait for 2 people to nohit one avoidance
they tie again what do you do
Taprus_ subscribed at Tier 1. They've subscribed for 11 months! Is he faring well? Only time can tell
its really been almost a year since mayumushi grind huh
he's experiencing a medley of emotions
god i hope yosniper water makes its return
let's put a learn-heavy section at the end of a hard save EleGiggle that'll be fun!
imo this save is way easier than the previous one or the kermit save
Cheer500 giving you this before I forget
virgin GBC cart vs chad farewell freeway
this can't be a guy game right
i wanna be the initial D
this must be the renex stage
soo uhh... what ISNT in this game?
dodged the spikes what a legend
there's some jank still here with the collisions cause the army wouldn't let smartkin out to fix it but uh yeah
basically smarktin was fooling around with this and made this and messaged me one day saying 'i have no diea what to do with this, want to put it in the farewell medley' and i couldn't say no
it was the original time smartkin intended which i think is like 3:35 or something
this really makes you feel like running in the 90's
my pb is 3:15 and i think his was like 3 minutes so there's some decent leeway
he also snuck a minor shortcut in which helps but isn't required if you want to know where that is
sadly not, the moles are just here to watch
never seen running in the 90s lemon?
welcome to the farewell medley lemon
farewell medley peaked at the colonel sex scene
1:10 on that last lap even with that crash is really good though
and cosmo fixed one variable so he gets that
and now back to your regularly scheduled kurath
this misses some Super Raiden OST to be epic
this stage was really fun to make as a side thing, definitely makes me consider doing something bigger but who knows
turns out the laser wasn't so required
it did work out for you the first time somehow
yeeeeah, those used to be included in kill count and i could see no way
not gonna say it's impossible, but damn
so how are you supposed to read this attack
he also really lets you walk into the trap of not buying to 10 lives
yeah but i don't think max'll need them
for regular people sure its a trap
but i think even then 5 is doable for most anyone
yeah i'm glad this stage has been a big hit, in terms of boss design my biggest pitfall is feeling like i have to do something wild every time
it definitely ramped up as i felt more comfortable getting aggressive with it
yeah was considering mentioning it ahead of time but figured i'd let you ask, lets you plan your upgrades too though i guess
i really like the song choice in the end, i actually generally hate picking music so having people like wolfi who picked this and skull to do it for me was nice at times
wait is the achievement for deathless stage or deathless boss
yeah solo projects i always did
ponder was much easier for me because it was a pure jukebox and much more representative of the type of music i listen to all the time
I don't really like picking music either but I'm too attached to my creations to let other people do it
tbf it's p different for avoidance
honeycomb attack is Impossible to read
yeah hitlessing this boss either involves figuring out how to read that or a bit of prayer
i guess missile 5 really matters for trying to bulldoze the laser guy before he gets a single shot off
my experience with it is once its on top of you you just have to believe you read it correctly otherwise you end up ramming into it
but i imagine there's a world where someone better at reading it can make that adjustment
i've seen ice cream trucks i'd say they're pretty real
what frozen wasteland do you live in
i really should add a skip intro on this
this is such a familiar feeling
quite a lot of times in FE I've had to do similar resets for chapter start RNG
its definitely a game that expects a certain level of familiarity with fangames and an interest in all kinds of wacky shit
id say i have good familiarity and wacky shit is my thing !!!
i think in our pre-release discussions cosmo rated this as one of the hardest achievements
he considers his clear on it somewhat of a wild fluke
i wanna learn how to make avoidances but i don't have much gamemaker experience, is there any like references i can use?
first off, should i use game maker studio 1 or 2?
there's also probably a lot more people who can help you with studio 1 in the community so if you plan on taking that route
may be harder, but definetly looks like more fun than influka area lol
the grid lasers is the 2nd hardest attack for me but you seem super consistent on it
i guess that's more familiar standard reading though
funny thing is after all this you're really like 2 quests into the main story
20 scroll speed and down and hard is easy
bar has to be atleast haflway up to 'win'
D F J K is a good combination
u might also want to try higher scroll speed
osu! catch the beat players sealCope
also where in the world can i download studio 1 can legit not find it anywhere
is this required to actually clesr or is it just an achievement?
yeah you don't even have to be able to beat it on easy to progress
whenever i go anywhere it just brings me to the gamemaker studio 2 version
is there a way i can get studio 1 tho?
thanks for stream as usual, gotta be ready for more crazy stuff next time
